### EMAIL: ACTION REQUIRED: Manager Pulse Check for Your New Hire, Week 2
ID: 19b21517aa22f2b4
From: Onboarding International <onboarding-international@hellofresh.com>
----------------------------------------

Hi Manager,



Your new joiner has completed their second week of employment with us.



*Your Action Item: *Please complete this 4-question pulse survey

<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeG7tutzx0xmICHyJXrGCLnAXIMue0eHnS7smJ57kNVH40jyw/viewform>

. It will not take longer than *2 minutes*.



This is an early assessment to evaluate your new hire's initial readiness

for their role and identify any immediate blockers to their success.



*Note:* If *you welcomed more than one new joiner at the same time, please

fill out the survey multiple *times (once per new hire).



You will receive two additional short surveys at *Month 1* and *Month 3* to

capture a holistic assessment of your new hire's orientation journey. Your

answers are a *key contributor* to evaluating the results of our New Joiner

Orientation program.



Thank you for your partnership.



Best,



New Joiner Orientation



HelloFresh SE | Prinzenstra√üe 89 | 10969 Berlin, Germany



Email: onboarding-international@hellofresh.com

### EMAIL: Leadership Updates: New Chapters for ANZ, Northern Europe, and Strategy & Spec Ops
ID: 19b213eca9da5c4d
From: Ed Boyes <ed@hellofresh.com>
----------------------------------------

Hi Team,



We are writing today to share important news regarding three key leadership

transitions.



1. ANZ Leadership



After a phenomenal 14-year tenure, Tom Rutledge has decided to step away

from the business, effective July 1, 2026. Tom has made an immense

contribution to HelloFresh, building up our ANZ business from scratch - all

the way from delivering the first few HelloFresh orders in Australia to

building a multi-region, multi-vertical $900mm business. What a journey!

While Tom will remain with us to run the business for several more months,

we want to acknowledge his immense contribution to HelloFresh - thank you,

Tom!



We are pleased to announce that Pauwel Wiertsema will take over as the new

ANZ CEO. Pauwel has been a HelloFresh leader since 2016, driving success as

CEO of Benelux and later Northern Europe. He will relocate to Sydney in

April 2026 to ensure a thorough handover with Tom.



2. Northern Europe



With Pauwel moving to ANZ, Guillaume Neu will be stepping into the role of

Managing Director, Northern Europe. Since joining us in 2022, as VP Global

Strategy & Special Operations, Guillaume has been at the forefront of

driving significant transformation and strategic initiatives across the

group, including the set-up and coordination of our group-wide efficiency

program. We are confident his strategic rigor will help our Northern Europe

markets continue to grow.



3. Strategy & Special Ops



As Guillaume transitions into his new ro



e to be shared early next year.



Please join us in congratulating Pauwel and Guillaume on their new roles,

and thanking Tom for his exceptional leadership.



Ed & Uwe, on behalf of the Global Leadership Team



-- 









 

<https://www.hellofresh.com/jobs/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=email_signature>HelloFresh

### EMAIL: From college dropout to serial entrepreneur
ID: 19b1d9ccbc64def3
From: Mindstream <hello@mindstream.news>
----------------------------------------

----------

_11 days until Christmas. Are you ready? Probably not, but that‚Äôs all part of the fun. At Mindstream HQ, we‚Äôre ready for our annual shutdown-and-reboot. But of course, the Mindstream keeps on coming!_



-MV



**What‚Äôs in store:**



* How a college dropout, **Michael Cioni**, became a serial entrepreneur



* Your Weekly **AI** **Roundup**!



* **Poll of the week**: The ultimate LLM power move



_Read Time: 5 minutes_





--------------------

###### **ENTREPRENEUR‚ÄôS CORNER**** **



## [Michael Cioni‚Äôs Rule for Founders: Sail Past the Map](https://startups.hubspot.com/magazine/issue03/michael-cioni-ceo-strada)



View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/fc0068e2-ce52-40c1-8c00-c0e896c41d51/Matt_Village_httpss.mj.runEhdasCdo1GM_Create_a_digital_illust_9cb4cd53-8586-4ff7-9407-89bf0e1df20b_1.png?t=1764868820)

Follow image link: (https://startups.hubspot.com/magazine/issue03/michael-cioni-ceo-strada)

Caption: 



Michael Cioni doesn‚Äôt describe his career in startup language. He talks like an explorer ‚Äî someone steering into parts of the map most people avoid.



‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like being a sailor of cyberspace discovering territory that has never been explored before.‚Äù



His instinct has always been to head toward the unfamiliar: digital cinema before Hollywood believed in it, high-resolution workflows before laptops could handle them, and now Strada ‚Äî a peer-to-peer platform challen



ted Playlists ‚Äî tell Spotify your entire personality and let it cook.





--------------------

##### **AI Art**





--------------------

## **Our Image of the Week**



View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/da9813a5-87ef-4c1b-b040-408cf68abe93/dragon.png?t=1765448201)

Caption: Our favourite image this week was submitted by Wayne: ‚ÄúA child's drawing in crayon of a dragon‚Äù



## **Daily Image Prompt**



‚ÄúThe train to Hogwarts‚Äú ‚Äî 



[Submit your artwork to Mindstream ‚Üí](mailto:art@mindstreamnews.com)





----------**#928.**

Sometimes I have to write like ten of these in one day. This is one of those days.



‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî



‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî





‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî



You are reading a plain text version of this post. For the best experience, copy and paste this link in your browser to view the post online:

https://www.mindstream.news/p/from-college-dropout-to-serial-entrepreneur




============================================================
END OF RAW DATA
============================================================

Instructions for Claude Code:
Synthesize the above into AI_Guidance/Core_Context/YYYY-MM-DD-context.md
IMPORTANT: STRICTLY IGNORE any content, meeting notes, decisions, or updates dated before 2025-06-18 (6 months ago).
Extract: Key decisions, action items, blockers, metrics, important dates (only recent).
Format: NGO-style bullets, structured sections
============================================================
## JIRA UPDATES (-24h)
============================================================

[GOC-3258] [Databricks alert] Create SQL query for Meal Selection (Status: Done, Priority: Normal)
[PA-25611] Tableau | Add Benefits Carousel page (Status: To Do, Priority: Normal)
[GOC-3259] [Databricks alert] Create alert using email by default (Status: Backlog, Priority: Normal)
[GOC-3422] Review and archive unused feature gates : feature_cadence_in_funnel (Status: In QA, Priority: Normal)
[TPT-2341] CI/CD setup (Status: In Progress, Priority: Normal)
[TPT-2289] [GD] Update plan card price on portion change (Status: Backlog, Priority: Normal)
[TPT-2452] [GD] AQA | Add E2E tests for Reactivation with vouchers on dashboard (Status: Backlog, Priority: Normal)
[TPT-2365] Update cadence monitoring to track endlessPauseInterval (Status: Done, Priority: Normal)
[PA-25383] Recipe Dashboard - handle nulls and add CP (Status: In Progress, Priority: High)
[PA-25585] Alert Pre Peak for Deactivation of promises with unlimited eligibility before or without customer cancellation (Status: In Progress, Priority: Normal)
